tenant_id.description: The tenant ID in a multi-tenancy cloud.

X-Openstack-Manila-Api-Version.description:
A valid Shared File Systems API micro-version.
 For example,
 "X-Openstack-Manila-Api-Version: 2.6".
 If you omit this header, the default micro-version is 2.0.

X-OpenStack-Manila-API-Experimental.description:
Indicates that this is an experimental Shared File
 Systems API request. Set to true.
 For example,
 "X-OpenStack-Manila-API-Experimental: true".

tenant_id.description: The tenant ID in a multi-tenancy cloud.

 For example,

X-OpenStack-Manila-API-Experimental.description:
Indicates that this is an experimental Shared File

actions.name: List consistency groups with details
actions.description: Lists all consistency groups with details.

tenant_id.description: The tenant ID in a multi-tenancy cloud.

consistency_group_id.description: The unique identifier of the consistency group.

X-Openstack-Manila-Api-Version.description:
A valid Shared File Systems API micro-version.
 For example,
 "X-Openstack-Manila-Api-Version: 2.6".
 If you omit this header, the default micro-version is 2.0.

X-OpenStack-Manila-API-Experimental.description:
Indicates that this is an experimental Shared File
 Systems API request. Set to true.
 For example,
 "X-OpenStack-Manila-API-Experimental: true".

actions.name: Show consistency group
actions.description: Shows information about a specified consistency group.

actions.name: Update consistency group
actions.description:
Updates a specified consistency group.
 You can update only these attributes:
 
 
 
 name, which changes the consistency group name.
 
 
 
 
 description, which changes the consistency group description.

tenant_id.description: The tenant ID in a multi-tenancy cloud.

consistency_group_id.description: The unique identifier of the consistency group.

X-Openstack-Manila-Api-Version.description:
A valid Shared File Systems API micro-version.
 For example,
 "X-Openstack-Manila-Api-Version: 2.6".
 If you omit this header, the default micro-version is 2.0.

X-OpenStack-Manila-API-Experimental.description:
Indicates that this is an experimental Shared File
 Systems API request. Set to true.
 For example,
 "X-OpenStack-Manila-API-Experimental: true".

actions.name: Reset consistency group state
actions.description:
Administrator only. Explicitly updates the state of a specified consistency group.
 Use the policy.json file to grant permissions for this action to other roles.

actions.name: Force-delete consistency group
actions.description:
Administrator only. Force-deletes a specified consistency group.
 Use the policy.json file to grant permissions for this action to other roles.

tenant_id.description: The tenant ID in a multi-tenancy cloud.

X-Openstack-Manila-Api-Version.description:
A valid Shared File Systems API micro-version.
 For example,
 "X-Openstack-Manila-Api-Version: 2.6".
 If you omit this header, the default micro-version is 2.0.

X-OpenStack-Manila-API-Experimental.description:
Indicates that this is an experimental Shared File
 Systems API request. Set to true.
 For example,
 "X-OpenStack-Manila-API-Experimental: true".

actions.name: Create consistency group snapshot
actions.description:
Creates a consistency group snapshot.
 
 You can create a consistency group snapshot for a consistency group
 in available state only.

tenant_id.description: The tenant ID in a multi-tenancy cloud.

X-Openstack-Manila-Api-Version.description:
A valid Shared File Systems API micro-version.
 For example,
 "X-Openstack-Manila-Api-Version: 2.6".
 If you omit this header, the default micro-version is 2.0.

X-OpenStack-Manila-API-Experimental.description:
Indicates that this is an experimental Shared File
 Systems API request. Set to true.
 For example,
 "X-OpenStack-Manila-API-Experimental: true".

actions.name: List consistency group snapshots with details
actions.description: Lists all consistency group snapshots with details.

tenant_id.description: The tenant ID in a multi-tenancy cloud.

cgsnapshot_id.description: The unique identifier of the consistency group snapshot.

X-Openstack-Manila-Api-Version.description:
A valid Shared File Systems API micro-version.
 For example,

 If you omit this header, the default micro-version is 2.0.

Indicates that this is an experimental Shared File
 Systems API request. Set to true.
 For example,

actions.name: Show consistency group snapshot
actions.description: Shows information about a specified consistency group snapshot.

actions.name: Update consistency group snapshot
actions.description:
Updates a specified consistency group snapshot.
 You can update only these attributes:
 
 
 
 name, which changes the consistency group snapshot name.
 
 
 
 
 description, which changes the consistency group snapshot description.

actions.name: Delete consistency group snapshot
actions.description: Deletes a specified consistency group snapshot.

tenant_id.description: The tenant ID in a multi-tenancy cloud.

cgsnapshot_id.description: The unique identifier of the consistency group snapshot.

X-Openstack-Manila-Api-Version.description:
A valid Shared File Systems API micro-version.
 For example,
 "X-Openstack-Manila-Api-Version: 2.6".
 If you omit this header, the default micro-version is 2.0.

X-OpenStack-Manila-API-Experimental.description:
Indicates that this is an experimental Shared File
 Systems API request. Set to true.
 For example,
 "X-OpenStack-Manila-API-Experimental: true".

actions.name: Show consistency group snapshot member
actions.description: Shows information about a specified consistency group snapshot member.

tenant_id.description: The tenant ID in a multi-tenancy cloud.

cgsnapshot_id.description: The unique identifier of the consistency group snapshot.

X-Openstack-Manila-Api-Version.description:
A valid Shared File Systems API micro-version.
 For example,
 "X-Openstack-Manila-Api-Version: 2.6".
 If you omit this header, the default micro-version is 2.0.

X-OpenStack-Manila-API-Experimental.description:
Indicates that this is an experimental Shared File
 Systems API request. Set to true.
 For example,
 "X-OpenStack-Manila-API-Experimental: true".

actions.name: Reset consistency group snapshot state
actions.description:
Administrator only. Explicitly updates the state of a specified consistency group snapshot.
 Administrators can use the policy.json file to permit other roles to complete this action.

actions.name: Force-delete consistency group snapshot
actions.description:
Administrator only. Force-deletes a specified consistency group snapshot.
 Use the policy.json file to grant permissions for this action to other roles.
